short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the total number of nested dependencies on npm

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply go to an npm package on npmjs.com and the total number of nested dependencies should show up under the number of direct dependencies.

Count different versions as different dependency.
